summary: this sword can kill all enemies and id u hit 5 enemies your onehanded level jumps to 100 and you level up superfast!
descriptionHtml:
basically you download this mod and then you go to your nearest blacksmith forge and then you select iron and click something along the lines of irondeadricswod  and i found it entertaining how it levels you up and also u gotta keep legendarying the oonehanded skill so to recap
1=Download
2Open skyrim
3Find nearest blacksmithforge 
4 find iron on catagorys
5 find deadricironsword (or somthin like that)
6 Craft it 
7 kill afew enemies with it 
8 happy leveling 
(note to self stop listing) 
( note to all you guys you can be anylevel aslong as you have iron smithing =) thx 4 download
(Second note it is as the form of a normal iron sword =)
author: DDhero123
